==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=𫛚}}

===Etymology===
The left component of this character was originally {{zh-l|幵}}, and this was an ancient name for the [[Chinese pond heron]]. The ''jiān'' reading comes from the original left component. The left component has been substituted for {{zh-l|开}} in both traditional and simplified Chinese. Mainland ornithologists have used this character in naming [[bittern|bitterns]] and certain other few species of [[heron]], and have given it the reading ''yán''.

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=yán,jiān
|cat=n
}}

====Noun====
{{zh-noun}}

# [[bittern]], and certain other few species of [[heron]]
